item.title: In a nutshell
item.description: PDF Letterhead is a simple desktop app for macOS to apply your own company logo or letterhead onto existing PDF documents. It’s just as easy as that: simply drag en drop a background and a PDF file and email, print or save your PDF’s with your company stationery on it. PDF Letterhead runs on your Mac with macOS Catalina or earlier. Currently macOS Big Sur is not supported. We’re working on a solution.

item.title: It's so easy
item.description: Place your logo or letterhead on all kinds of documents Add a different cover page to larger files like contracts Email, print or save your personalized PDFs

item.title: Removes non-transparent white backgrounds
item.description: PDF Letterhead merges two PDF documents with overlay. This, of course doesn’t work for non-transparent documents. For example, PDFs created with Apple Pages always have a white background. We built a feature that automatically removes the white background. PDF Letterhead is now suitable for PDF non-transparent documents!
